title: Billy Joel coming to Amalie Arena
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Billy Joel coming to Amalie Arena TAMPA, FL – Tampa Bay Sports and Entertainment, LLC announced today that legendary musician Billy Joel will perform at AMALIE Arena in Tampa, Florida on Friday, January 22, 2016 at 8:00 PM. Post to Facebook Billy Joel coming to Amalie Arena TAMPA, FL – Tampa Bay Sports and Entertainment, LLC announced today that legendary musician Billy Joel will perform at AMALIE Arena in Tampa, Florida on Friday, January 22, 2016 at 8:00 PM. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Billy Joel coming to Amalie Arena 10 News Staff, WTSP 7:52 a.m. EDT October 15, 2015 Musician Billy Joel speaks onstage at the New Yorker Festival 2015 - Billy Joel Talks With Nick Paumgarten at SIR Stage 37 on October 4, 2015 in New York City. (Photo: Bryan Bedder / Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
TAMPA, FL – Tampa Bay Sports and Entertainment, LLC announced today that legendary musician Billy Joel will perform at AMALIE Arena in Tampa, Florida on Friday, January 22, 2016 at 8:00 PM. 
American Express® Card Members can purchase tickets before the general public beginning Monday, October 19 at 10:00 AM through Thursday, October 22 at 10:00 PM. 
Tickets will go on sale to the general public beginning Friday, October 23 at 10:00 AM and can be purchased at the McDonald’s® Ticket Office at AMALIE Arena, Ticketmaster outlets and at Ticketmaster.com. To order tickets by phone call 800.745.3000. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1RJQCdk TOP VIDEOS
